name: Non-Intrusive
info: We don't intercept your data or intrude in the network to decrease the performance. Instead we used a passive monitoring approach that sits behind the scene.

name: Adaptive
info: Our advanced Artificial Intelligence adapts to your organization's behavior and self-learns to detect the slightest abnormality in activities.

name: Personalized
info: We understand the humans behind the system and approach your cyber security from a human-centric point of view.

name: Real-Time
info: Identify suspicious activity right when it happens in real time through our advanced monitoring system.
